original_title: 2014 Bigbang + A Concert in Seoul Live
overview: After a record-setting six-dome tour in Japan, Big Bang brought the music back home for 2014 Big Bang +α in Seoul, held on January 24 to 26 at the Olympic Park. The live DVD release captures the group's exciting concert which includes performance of favorites like Fantastic Baby, "Lies," "Heaven" and Blue as well as solo stages by each member. This release also includes bonus discs with special features and multiangle footage.
title: 2014 Bigbang + A Concert in Seoul Live
